# getApiInfo

Gets API information.

```
GET /
--- 200 OK
{
  "service": "(string)",
  "version": "(string)"
}
```

| response | type | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| service | string | The name of the service. |
| version | string | The version of the service. |

The name of the service should be `ConformanceApi`.
